## utils.colour.rgbToHex() function

Converts a colour from RGB to hex representation.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function rgbToHex(r: number, g: number, b: number): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  r | number | Amount of red, int between 0 and 255. |
|  g | number | Amount of green, int between 0 and 255. |
|  b | number | Amount of blue, int between 0 and 255. |

**Returns:**

string

Hex representation of the colour.
